sub_title: Chief Legal, Compliance and Corporate Governance Officer at NEQSOL HOLDING
summary:
Experienced legal and compliance professional with proven delivery of high-profile work with international impact in diverse environments.  More than twenty years of experience in legal counseling, external affairs and stakeholder management, regulatory compliance and risk management and leading commercial negotiations. 

Inspirational leader – enjoys engaging and communicating with big audiences. Fluent in Azerbaijani, English, Russian and Turkish languages. 

Awarded with the medal of “Progress” by the President of the Republic of Azerbaijan in recognition of contributions to TANAP and Shah Deniz natural gas projects in the region.
